pr_title: Fix gRPC exception handling and improve traces

timeline.message: Avoid throwing CANCELLED if stream is closed

timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: When given an instance, the string generated will start with that class's name. (Something like "GrpcChannel { Host=....... }". Giving empty header makes the traces much cleaner.
replies.author: ggezer

replies.bodyText: We want to remove the class name? I would have thought the class name is useful?
replies.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: Yeah, I think it's better for this particular one. For the rest, empty is better.
replies.author: ggezer

timeline.bodyText: could you add a comment in the code to explain why this has to be synchronized?
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: do we want to keep this non-null if there is an issue with dispose? Basically, should we set it to null in finally or here?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: We don't want to keep it set if dispose fails. So in finally is better.
replies.author: ggezer

timeline.bodyText: can you leave a comment as to why this and others have to be synchronized? (seems like it is for mSaslClient?)
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: I am confused when this is supposed to be "" or this?
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: I am confused when this is supposed to be "" or this?
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: I am confused when this is supposed to be "" or this?
